ROW.PDT: *IF (*VALUE KRZ_ASM_BGPROCESS_STATS.Process_Name *EQ 'DBW' *AND *VALUE KRZ_ASM_BGPROCESS_STATS.Process_Count *EQ 0) *OR (*VALUE KRZ_ASM_BGPROCESS_STATS.Process_Name *EQ 'LGWR' *AND *VALUE KRZ_ASM_BGPROCESS_STATS.Process_Count *EQ 0) *OR (*VALUE KRZ_ASM_BGPROCESS_STATS.Process_Name *EQ 'SMON' *AND *VALUE KRZ_ASM_BGPROCESS_STATS.Process_Count *EQ 0) *OR (*VALUE KRZ_ASM_BGPROCESS_STATS.Process_Name *EQ 'PMON' *AND *VALUE KRZ_ASM_BGPROCESS_STATS.Process_Count *EQ 0)
